name: BOI, get that tentacle away from me
name_original: BOI, get that tentacle away from me
description:
It is the sequel to the first fan game for the Boys on  Internet.

Warning: contains swearing, innuendos and limited lewd art

The God of Anime is at it again. While Blairlex and Scottscy are fighting over whether Scottscy is using too many Jojo references, the God of Anime summons them to their dimension. But before the matter is resolved the God is abducted by the tentacle monster. The mascots Pipi and Callum are  captured as well and the boys have to  take their own paths through several mazes to get to their goal and save everyone.

Made with the help of @TidXbiT and @sweaterangst (twitter)
